entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Lifetime Membershipï¼š9,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 8,99Â â‚¬ [8,99Â â‚¬ ~ 9,99Â â‚¬]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Compras integradas

  • Quarterly Membershipï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Lifetime - Educationï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜å‡çº§ç»ˆèº«ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š9,99Â â‚¬
  • Yearly Membershipï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • Monthly Membershipï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • æœˆåº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼š0,99Â â‚¬
  • Lifetime Membershipï¼š8,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

entry.title: MyTracks: GPS Recorder
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 0,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Compras integradas

  • 300 Altitude Query Timesï¼š3,99Â â‚¬
  • 100 Altitude Query Timesï¼š2,99Â â‚¬
  • Lifetime Premiumï¼š9,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations. Here's what you can do with MyTracks: - Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map. - Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app. - Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ. - Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks. - Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations. - Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance. - Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time. - Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track. - Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification. Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 1,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story. The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability! "Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world. One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars. [Features of Knight and Dragon 3] â–½ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game! â–½ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemyâ€™s attack timings! â–½ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons! â–½ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong! â–½ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story! â–½ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued! ãƒ»ãƒ»ãƒ» For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try. Official Homepage http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Compras integradas

  • Basic Plan - Monthlyï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

  • KALPA Collaboration Passï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Save the world by the power of music in this dynamic & refreshing rhythm game! Play the tunes and follow the rhythm, explore and revive the world. Unlock music of various genres, conquer specially designed boss-stages, and indulge in an artistic picture book! AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS 2016 1st IMGA SEA â€œExcellence in Audioâ€ 2017 Taipei Game Show Indie Game Award â€œBest Audioâ€ 2017 13th IMGA Global Nominee 2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia â€œBest Mobile Gameâ€ Nominee FEATURES >> Innovative and Dynamic Rhythm Game Not the rhythm game you used to know: we add unique animation to the plate you'll be playing on. Dozens of fantastic music tracks and amazing boss-stage features, different charts and challenges; gentle or intense, beginners, advanced players and experts can all have their game! >> Artistic and Refreshing Picture Book "I trust that you, the one blessed by the gods of melody, can surely revive the former world order." "Tune" the chaotic energy back to harmony, and the world will gradually reveal. Explore places on the map, read a beautifully handcrafted picture book, and collect items on the way as souvenir! >> Achievement, Leaderboard, and More Collect achievements as the story progress, share your results to friends, and compete with other players on the leaderboard. Supports cloud save. LINKS Official site https://noxygames.com/lanota/ Privacy Policy & Terms of Use https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html Twitter https://twitter.com/Noxy_Lanota_EN/ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lanota/ Discord Server https://discord.gg/lanota

# Filebar Filebar æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ç°ä»£åŒ–çš„å¤šåª’ä½“æ’­æ”¾å™¨ï¼Œæä¾›è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å™¨ã€éŸ³ä¹æ’­æ”¾å™¨ã€äº‘ç«¯æœåŠ¡å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ ## ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½ ### è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å™¨ Filebar æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¼ºå¤§çš„è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å™¨ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æ’­æ”¾æ›´å¤šçš„è§†é¢‘æ ¼å¼ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬æ ‡å‡†çš„MP4ã€M4V å’Œ MOVï¼Œè¿˜åŠ ä¸ŠMKVã€AVIã€WMVã€FLVã€OMGã€OGVã€3GPã€RMVBç­‰ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥æµè§ˆæ’­æ”¾ä½ çš„macã€pcã€NASã€FTPä¸Šçš„è§†é¢‘ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è¿˜æ”¯æŒæ’­æ”¾åª’ä½“æœåŠ¡å™¨ ï¼ˆå¦‚Embyã€Jellyfinã€Plexåª’ä½“æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼‰ä¸Šçš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œæ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ’­æ”¾æ¥è‡ªäº‘ç«¯æœåŠ¡çš„è§†é¢‘ã€‚ ### éŸ³ä¹æ’­æ”¾å™¨ Filebar æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ¼‚äº®çš„æœ¬åœ°éŸ³ä¹æ’­æ”¾å™¨ç”¨æ¥æ’­æ”¾æœ¬åœ°å’Œäº‘ç«¯éŸ³ä¹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒçš„éŸ³é¢‘æ ¼å¼æœ‰ MP3/M4A/FLACã€‚Filebar æ”¯æŒåŠ è½½åŒç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ­Œè¯æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ æ­Œæ›²åç§°.mp3ã€æ­Œæ›²åç§°.lrc çš„æ­Œè¯æ–‡ä»¶ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½ã€‚ ### äº‘ç«¯æœåŠ¡ äº‘ç«¯æœåŠ¡æ˜¯ Filebar å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ Filebar ä½ å¯ä»¥æ–¹ä¾¿ç®¡ç†äº‘ç«¯æœåŠ¡ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹/åˆ é™¤/æ’­æ”¾/æ‰¹é‡é‡å‘½å/æŸ¥çœ‹ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒç™¾åº¦ç½‘ç›˜ã€é˜¿é‡Œäº‘ç›˜ã€OneDriveã€Dropboxã€Google Drive ç­‰å¸¸è§ç½‘ç›˜ã€‚åŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿæä¾›äº†è¿œç¨‹åè®®çš„æ”¯æŒï¼Œæ”¯æŒçš„åè®®æœ‰ SMBã€WebDAVã€Synologyã€FTPã€SFTPã€‚ ### æ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç† åŒæ—¶ Filebar è¿˜æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†å™¨ã€‚æ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç®¡ç†æ‚¨çš„æœ¬åœ°ä¸è¿œç¨‹æ–‡ä»¶ï¼šç§»åŠ¨ã€åˆ é™¤ã€ç¼–è¾‘ã€å¤åˆ¶ã€ä¸Šä¼ ã€æ‰¹é‡é‡å‘½åç­‰ç­‰ï¼›åŒæ—¶Filebar è¿˜æ”¯æŒå¯¹äºå¸¸è§å‹ç¼©æ–‡ä»¶çš„å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¦‚Zipã€Rarã€7zç­‰å‹ç¼©æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼ã€‚ ## å®¢æˆ·æ”¯æŒ å¦‚æœæ‚¨æœ‰ä»»ä½•å»ºè®®æˆ–æƒ³æ³•ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è”ç³»æˆ‘ä»¬ã€‚ - ç½‘ç«™ï¼šhttps://fileball.app - é‚®ä»¶ï¼šfilebox.app@outlook.com

entry.title: Dark Reader for Safari
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š5,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 1,99Â â‚¬ [1,99Â â‚¬ ~ 8,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Dark Reader is an eye-care Safari extension that enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. It inverts bright colors to make web pages high contrast and easier to read. Dark Reader integrates seamlessly with system dark mode. Adjust brightness and contrast to match your display and ambient lighting. Enable dark mode on every web page or give websites a sepia tone. Select from multiple color theme presets or create your own by customizing background and text colors. Enable or disable Dark Reader for specific websites, automatically sync with system dark mode, or detect already dark websites and leave them unchanged. Developed by the original creators of Dark Reader. Since 2014, we continuously evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support for people sensitive to bright light. A single purchase includes access to the macOS version (Safari browser) when using the same iCloud account. Dark Reader contains no ads and does not collect user data. Enable Dark Reader in Safari preferences and disable similar extensions to prevent conflicts. Enjoy browsing!

iPad
